title: (1) Veste Coburg and Schloss Ernsthöhe from the North-West, with Veste Coburg in Sky Above and Figures; (2) Veste Coburg from the North-West; (3) Coburg: St Moriz’s Church and Schloss Ehrenburg; (4) Veste Coburg and Schloss Ernsthöhe, with Details
